overview: Two people are on the road. Everyday life, business calls, games, a curve of the highway, a swing and again business callsâ€¦  During this year the father and the daughter have not seen much of each other and they have not been alone for a long time.  Two cameras are looking face to face; different fears inhabit one and the same space.  There is a question: should they come back or should they continue travelling together?
title: Together
